reviews.text: Morton Pool Solutions / Renovations Updated by this business 5 days ago What to look for when hiring a pool contractor? Not all pool contractors are the same - here's how to tell they'll be a great partner for your pool projects in the North Dallas area: 1. Experience Nothing can replace experience - make sure your contractor has (and can prove) experience not only in the industry, but also in your area. 2. Recent Work/Activity A good pool contractor will be happy to show you their most recent w

"Awesome service and workmanship, quickly done!" "Thank you Rick for your dedication to customer service and quality of work." "He promised quality work and he delivered."

We just finished a remodel of our pool with Rick, including resurfacing, new coping, new tile, removal of spa, and added stonework on an existing brick wall, and we are so happy! After meeting with a few different companies, we felt most … More Response from the owner 2 months ago Thank you so much for your business and continued support. We enjoyed the ability to streamline your project, everything fell together nicely.

I cannot say enough wonderful things about Rick Morton from Morton Pool Solutions. We just completed our renovation on our 1980's pool with Rick in less than 30 days. Communication was stellar and his crews were all wonderful to work with. … More Response from the owner 7 months ago Thank you so much for your business, and continued support.

Having our pool remodeled by Rick Morton has hands down been one of the best home improvement experiences we have ever had. Start to finish, Rick was available every step of the project. Communication and follow-through were exceptional. … More Response from the owner 4 months ago Thank you so much for your business and continued support.
